item.title: NUKE CRAZY!
item.description:
apnews.com
KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — President Vladimir Putin dramatically escalated East-West tensions by ordering Russian nuclear forces put on high alert Sunday, while Ukraine's embattled leader agreed to talks with Moscow as Putin's troops and tanks drove deeper into the country, closing in around the capital.

item.title: STUDY: Multiple Sclerosis Linked To Eating Meat...
item.description:
www.gutnews.com
Several genetic and environmental factors cause multiple sclerosis and a new report suggests these may include eating meat and having a less diverse gut.

item.title: 4.1 mag quake shakes Ventura...
item.description:
www.foxla.com
A preliminary magnitude 4.1 earthquake struck Saturday evening in Ventura County. There were no immediate reports of damage or injuries.

item.title: Navy seizes 2 boats as war goes to seas...
item.description:
www.express.co.uk
THE RUSSIAN NAVY has captured two Ukrainian civilian ships, as the war between the countries continues.

item.title: Moscow central bank urges calm amid cash run fears...
item.description:
www.bbc.com
The Bank of Russia says it has enough liquidity to 'function smoothly' despite new sanctions.

item.title: Europe closing skies to Russian flights...
item.description:
www.politico.eu
Some of the EU’s major airlines have canceled their flights to Russia.

item.title: DAILY BEAST Journalists 'Lucky' to Survive After Being Shot in Ukraine...
item.description:
www.thedailybeast.com
Brilliant war reporters Emil Filtenborg and Stefan Weichert suffered multiple gunshot wounds in northeast Ukraine.

item.title: Fuel, logistics problems frustrate advance...
item.description:
www.jpost.com
The Russian bear forgot one important thing: fuel. Without proper logistics, no army — no matter how strong — can conquer another.

item.title: 368,000 flee...
item.description:
www.cnn.com
A battle is underway for control of Ukraine's capital, Kyiv. The US has warned Russia is seeking to encircle the city, and a Ukrainian official said it has been hit by missiles. Follow here for live news updates from the ground in Ukraine.

item.title: Bloody fighting erupts on streets of 2nd largest city Kharkiv...
item.description:
www.thesun.co.uk
RUSSIAN troops are blasting their way into Ukraine’s second largest city today after bloody fighting last night erupted on the streets. Soliders in TIGR armoured vehicles were spotted in two suburb…

item.title: Thousands of Russians FLEE to escape conscription: 'Not wanted'...
item.description:
www.express.co.uk
VLADIMIR Putin faces humiliation after it emerged that thousands of Russians are attempting to flee in order to dodge conscription.

item.title: 4,300 dead, 146 tanks smashed...
item.description:

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Was Surprise Speaker at White-Nationalist Event...
item.description:
nymag.com
The congresswoman delivered remarks at the America First Political Action Conference on Friday, shortly after a round of applause for Vladimir Putin.
